name: @the-sage-group/awyes
description: JavaScript/TypeScript client for awyes gRPC service

scripts.build:proto: mkdir -p src/generated && protoc --proto_path=../.. --plugin=protoc-gen-ts_proto=./node_modules/.bin/protoc-gen-ts_proto --ts_proto_out=./src/generated --ts_proto_opt=esModuleInterop=true,outputServices=grpc-js,outputClientImpl=grpc-js,useExactTypes=false proto/awyes.proto && mv src/generated/proto/awyes.ts src/generated/awyes.ts && rm -r src/generated/proto
scripts.prepare: npm run clean && npm run build:proto && npm run build

author: trumanpurnell
